checkBoard() - Method in class ui.Connect4TextConsole
Checks the board status, to be used after playerMove();
checkDraw() - Method in class core.Connect4
Will check to if the entire board has been filled and no more moves can be made.
checkForBlock() - Method in class core.Connect4ComputerPlayer
CPU checks if it needs to block a player chance, RNG is used to make the CPU miss a block.
checkForWin() - Method in class core.Connect4ComputerPlayer
CPU checks to see if it can win
chooseRandom() - Method in class core.Connect4ComputerPlayer
